channel.title: [317] RuneWorld [317] [Updated A Lot]
channel.description:
[center][size=30pt]RuneWorld[/size][/center] [center][i]The world is about to go rune![/i][/center] [center]RuneWorld is an 317 Project all started by me, I'm currently working on it a lot alone, but if your interested in helping me and have some Coding knowledge, just PM me, and I do have MSN. I've decided to start off with an clean Devolution 2.7 base since I will be more likely be using its combat. This will be both PvP and Skilling based server that everyone can enjoy. Economy is based on fellow players, monsters and skilling. You have to either, kill monsters for its drops (Which you can sell to players for a heap of money according on how valuable it is) or Player killing (Kill players, take items, sell or keep, simple and effective). When it comes to skilling, the economy will be at its best, you have to fish for your own food, you have to cook your own food, you have to make your own potions, ectera. (Not counting trading with other players) A few of the features in this server will be custom-made minigames, decent skilling, near perfect combat(Not sure about if I actually do add full combat), full magic and maybe near future, full godwars. The only custom combat items added on the server will be Godswords (Rare), PvP armour (Extremely rare chance of getting when killing a player) and Dragon claws (Extremely rare). Custom skilling items are not decided yet. Credits goes to Galkon for the Refactored Client Base. And Credits to glestrts for helping me with the server. This topic will be updated with lasted news, updates and media from the server. [size=15pt][b]Update Log[/b][/size]
[b]Server Side[/b] Fixed several bugs in Combat and Duplicating. Edited textHandler to my prefer and cleaned out several codes. Fixed headicons. (Only thing left is to make skulls work) Added fully working Friend and Ignore lists. All added quests are done on log in. Custom Starter int added, saves into Character file and no longer needs to check if QH().q1 = 0. Added Buy X, Bank X and Trade X. Added Experience Lock for Combat. Fixed most special attacks, they were hitting twice and special bar not working. Added random PvP drops. (Additional drops alongside with the items the other player has) Added full RuneScape NPC spawn. Added Premium only areas. (Fishing guild and Slayer tower) [b]Client Side[/b] Added SWAT's Emote system. (Credit to SWAT) Added new teleport menu interface with 4 buttons. Added new Friend and Ignore list interfaces. Added a few new items.
[size=15pt][b]Currently Doing[/b][/size]
[b]Server Side[/b] Trying to remove all added quests. Fixing special attack on Magic shortbow. Fixing Nulls, flooding and Syis. [b]Client Side[/b] Adding more teleport menu interfaces, all with 4 buttons for even more teleports.
[size=15pt]Media[/size] [b]Start (You won't spawn in Edgeville)[/b] [IMG]http://i1016.photobucket.com/albums/af290/Runeter/RuneWorld/Intro.png[/img] [b]PKing[/b] [IMG]http://i1016.photobucket.com/albums/af290/Runeter/RuneWorld/PKing.png[/img] [/center]

item.title: [317] RuneWorld [317] [Updated A Lot]
item.dc:creator: @T3arful T3arful
item.description:
@T3arful wrote:

xDakota:

Don’t bother with Devolution 2.7, the stability problems are horrible. I wouldn’t even bother trying to fix it honestly.

It has nullpointer issues that crash the server which can all be easily fixed by using the crash-patching method by Blakeman8192.

Read full topic

item.title: [317] RuneWorld [317] [Updated A Lot]
item.dc:creator: @ProgramingForever ProgramingForever
item.description:
@ProgramingForever wrote:

Fuck you, you copyed my name RUNEWORLD, everyone knows i owned runeworld.servegame.com, runew0rld.servegame.com etc. i dont anymore so this cant be advertising at all, and also i must comment your doing pretty good.

Read full topic

item.title: [317] RuneWorld [317] [Updated A Lot]
item.dc:creator: @alexahnon alexahnon
item.description:
@alexahnon wrote:

Rixxx:

[quote]Economy is based on fellow players, monsters and skilling. You have to either, kill monsters for its drops (Which you can sell to players for a heap of money according on how valuable it is) or Player killing (Kill players, take items, sell or keep, simple and effective). When it comes to skilling, the economy will be at its best, you have to fish for your own food, you have to cook your own food, you have to make your own potions, ectera.

This, I’ve seen too much. And in the end, the progress is not heard of.

But good luck with it.[/quote]

Well, I can promise you that this server will be focused on the economy and features mostly. And thanks for posting.

Updates
Changed Start and Respawn point to Lletya. (New home)
You get about 1 piece of PvP equipment per 70 kills to keep it balanced. (Average)
Still working on Nulling, flooding and syis.
Gave up on firemaking, will be updating it later.
Working on degradable PvP equipment. (A piece of PvP equipment will last 2 hours of combat, this will take some time to finish)

And if someone have some coding knowledge, I would appreciate if someone helped me.

Read full topic

item.title: [317] RuneWorld [317] [Updated A Lot]
item.dc:creator: @Rixxx Rix_
item.description:
@Rixxx wrote:

Economy is based on fellow players, monsters and skilling. You have to either, kill monsters for its drops (Which you can sell to players for a heap of money according on how valuable it is) or Player killing (Kill players, take items, sell or keep, simple and effective). When it comes to skilling, the economy will be at its best, you have to fish for your own food, you have to cook your own food, you have to make your own potions, ectera.

This, I’ve seen too much. And in the end, the progress is not heard of.

But good luck with it.

Read full topic

item.title: [317] RuneWorld [317] [Updated A Lot]

@alexahnon wrote:

Added my own PvP drop system, easily editable. (Credits to glestrts for helping me)
Improved my current Cooking by adding Manta Ray and Sea Turtle cook-able.
Currently trying to fix nulling, flooding and Syis.
Fixing firemaking as well.

Going great

item.description:
@alexahnon wrote:

[center][size=30pt]RuneWorld[/size][/center]
[center]The world is about to go rune![/center]

[center]RuneWorld is an 317 Project all started by me, I’m currently working on it a lot alone, but if your interested in helping me and have some Coding knowledge, just PM me, and I do have MSN. I’ve decided to start off with an clean Devolution 2.7 base since I will be more likely be using its combat. This will be both PvP and Skilling based server that everyone can enjoy. Economy is based on fellow players, monsters and skilling. You have to either, kill monsters for its drops (Which you can sell to players for a heap of money according on how valuable it is) or Player killing (Kill players, take items, sell or keep, simple and effective). When it comes to skilling, the economy will be at its best, you have to fish for your own food, you have to cook your own food, you have to make your own potions, ectera. (Not counting trading with other players) A few of the features in this server will be custom-made minigames, decent skilling, near perfect combat(Not sure about if I actually do add full combat), full magic and maybe near future, full godwars. The only custom combat items added on the server will be Godswords (Rare), PvP armour (Extremely rare chance of getting when killing a player) and Dragon claws (Extremely rare). Custom skilling items are not decided yet. Credits goes to Galkon for the Refactored Client Base. And Credits to glestrts for helping me with the server.

This topic will be updated with lasted news, updates and media from the server.

[size=15pt]Update Log[/size]

[b]Server Side[/b] Fixed several bugs in Combat and Duplicating. Edited textHandler to my prefer and cleaned out several codes. Fixed headicons. (Only thing left is to make skulls work) Added fully working Friend and Ignore lists. All added quests are done on log in. Custom Starter int added, saves into Character file and no longer needs to check if QH().q1 = 0. Added Buy X, Bank X and Trade X. Added Experience Lock for Combat. Fixed most special attacks, they were hitting twice and special bar not working. Added random PvP drops. (Additional drops alongside with the items the other player has) Added full RuneScape NPC spawn. Added Premium only areas. (Fishing guild and Slayer tower)

Client Side
Added SWAT’s Emote system. (Credit to SWAT)
Added new teleport menu interface with 4 buttons.
Added new Friend and Ignore list interfaces.
Added a few new items.

[size=15pt]Currently Doing[/size]

[b]Server Side[/b] Trying to remove all added quests. Fixing special attack on Magic shortbow. Fixing Nulls, flooding and Syis.

Client Side
Adding more teleport menu interfaces, all with 4 buttons for even more teleports.
